{{Actor| | type = Puzzle item | name = Yorick's skull | class = PuzzSkull | game = Hexen | doomednum = 9002 | spawnid = 76 | spawnname = T_PUZZSKULL | puzzid = 0 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:PuzzleItem|PuzzleItem]]→PuzzSkull
Yorick's skull. After obtaining this artifact, the player must find the [[Classes:ZWingedStatueNoSkull|headless statue]] onto which it fits. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR PuzzSkull : {{Class|PuzzleItem}} { {{Property|PuzzleItem.Number}} 0 {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} ARTISKLL {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_ARTIPUZZSKULL" // "YORICK'S SKULL" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_ARTIPUZZSKULL" States { Spawn: ASKU A -1 Stop } }
